title: Pharmacy | Prescriptions, Immunizations & More
description: Get safe & easy immunizations such as the flu and COVID-19 vaccine, help with Medicare, prescription management, and more.
cleaned_text: We care about you and your family's health. Our knowledgeable pharmacists are here to provide safe and easy vaccinations, answer your questions, and more. Stop in for your flu shot today! A convenient option for recurring prescriptions. Typically arrives within 5 business days. Wegmans Pharmacy offers easy order tracking, refill reminders, and more.
